topic.title: Everything in Attention
topic.shortdesc: This will test anything and everything in <note @type="attention">, which gets converted to an IDDoc attention tag.

body.note:
Any note should of course start with basic text. Followed by other stuff. As for the other stuff, we'll put phrase-level stuff first. test apiname test bold (test boolean ->) test cite test cmdname test codeph test filepath test footnote test italic test inline image: test indexterm test keyword test menucascade/uicontrol test msgnum test msgph [skipping object] test option test parmname test ph testing a quote (test state -> ) test sub test sup test synph test systemoutput test term tm to amazon test tt test underlined test uicontrol test uicontrol/shortcut test userinput test varname test wintitle test xref to the top Now let's test block-level stuff:
test ul
test ul again
test ul again again testing a table in an example
testing a
basic table
testing a syntaxdiagram
simple list here
simple table simpler table end of simple table
simple table simpler table end of simple table
put up the screen if you're in the mood for windThis is required cleanup in my exampletest pre test pre test pre pt this is a parml test
pt this is a parml test
testing a paragraph. That's a novel idea. well, if it is I should put it in <lq>.
test ol
test ol again
test ol a third time test msgblock test msgblock test msgblockLQ: Darryl Strawberry was sentenced to 18 months in prison Monday for violating his probation on a 1999 conviction on drug and solicitation of prostitution charges.test lines test lines test lines(that was a placement=break image)Figure in a section
Placing a figure in a section placing a draft-comment in the section
dl in section this is what a dl in a section looks like
dl in section this is what a dl in a section looks like test codeblock test codeblock test codeblock
